nodes.title: Make use of Off or Bypass setting
widgets_values: You can leave the saver node set to off until you have a final image you are satisfied with.

nodes.title: Region 1 Prompt
widgets_values: katsuragi misato, ;P, winter coat, neon genesis evangelion

nodes.title: Region 3 Prompt
widgets_values: neon, g0thic, cityscape, blurry background, dramatic lighting,

nodes.title: Region 2 Prompt
widgets_values: sailor moon, tsukino usagi, sailor senshi uniform, v-sign, christmas hat

nodes.title: TO GENERATE REGION MASKS
widgets_values:
1. Set Regional Prompting group to bypass (right click group -> Bypass group nodes)
2. Generate  base image
3. Right click Preview Image -> Open Mask Editor -> Paint over desired region -> save
4. Right click Preview Image -> Copy (Clipspace) -> Right click Mask 1 -> Paste (Clipspace) -> Right click Mask 2 -> Paste (Clipspace) -> Open mask 2 in mask editor -> paint over desired region or just invert region 1 -> etc etc etc

Once you have a mask for each region you want you can set unnecesary regions to bypass and generate.

nodes.title: Regional LoRA application
widgets_values: Applying loras to regions is optional, if you dont want to apply a lora just set the lora selector, create hook lora and set clip hooks nodes for that region to bypass.

nodes.title: Metadata collection (blue nodes)
widgets_values: The string formatting for metadata is set up such that you do not need to turn on or off individual parts depending on the number of regions used. Empty inputs are not included in the outputs.

nodes.title: Timestepping
widgets_values: Regional Timesteps Range sets the percentage of steps where the regional prompting is active. Setting start percent to something like 0.1 or 0.25 helps retain composition of base image.
